question: What leadership insights have companies shared about their strategic focus on AI, and what technologies are they investing in?

subtasks.task: Gather leadership insights related to AI from leadership excerpts. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt]
Identify the strategic focus areas on AI. [CompanyFocusAreaDetail]

Combine insights from all three sources to present a unified perspective. [CompanyLeadershipExcerpt, CompanyFocusAreaDetail, CompanyTechStack]
